<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create Connection</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/mt/monitor/v1/interconnect/backbones/{backboneId}/connections"}></MethodEndpoint>



Create a connection using backbone ID.


## Request
